sentences.en: "I fell in a ditch", he said, rubbing at a scrape on his hand.
sentences.cn: “我掉进沟里了”，他一边说着，一边揉着手上的擦伤。

sentences.en: From the other side of the door came the scrape of a guard's boot.
sentences.cn: 从门的另一侧传来了保安嚓嚓的马靴声.

sentences.en: He almost manages to scrape a living as an artist.
sentences.cn: 他靠当艺术家来勉强混口饭吃。

sentences.en: He pushed back his chair with a loud scrape.
sentences.cn: “嘎”的一声,他把椅子推回了原位.

sentences.en: He refused to bow and scrape to every customer.
sentences.cn: 他不愿奉承每个顾客.

sentences.en: I came away from the accident with only cuts and scrapes.
sentences.cn: 这次事故我只受了点皮外伤。

sentences.en: I heard the side of the car scrape against the wall.
sentences.cn: 我听到汽车的侧面蹭着墙了。

sentences.en: I'll have to scrape together some money for a sight - seeing trip.
sentences.cn: 我得积蓄点钱去旅游.

sentences.en: If we can get a draw, we might scrape through.
sentences.cn: 如果我们能打平，可能会勉强获胜。

sentences.en: Scrape off all the meat juices stuck to the bottom of the pan.
sentences.cn: 把粘在平底锅底的肉汁全擦掉。

sentences.en: Scrape the carrots and slice them thinly.
sentences.cn: 把这些胡萝卜去皮切成薄片。

sentences.en: Scrape the hulled beans together.
sentences.cn: 把剥好的豆子胡噜到一堆儿.

sentences.en: She emerged from the overturned car with only a few scrapes and bruises.
sentences.cn: 她从翻了的车里钻出来，只擦破一点皮，碰了几块淤青。

sentences.en: The car hurtled past us, scraping the wall and screeching to a halt.
sentences.cn: 那辆汽车从我们身旁疾驰而过，刮擦着墙嘎然停下。

sentences.en: The high mountains seem to scrape the sky.
sentences.cn: 峻岭摩天.

sentences.en: The only sound is that of knives and forks scraping against china.
sentences.cn: 惟一的声音是刀叉刮擦瓷器的声音。

sentences.en: the scrape of iron on stone
sentences.cn: 铁摩擦石头发出的嚓嚓声

sentences.en: The two of them scraped their dishes clean .
sentences.cn: 他们两个把盘子擦得干干净净。

sentences.en: The two of them scraped their dishes clean.
sentences.cn: 他们两个把盘子擦得干干净净。

sentences.en: These are young carrots and you need not scrape them.
sentences.cn: 这些胡萝卜很嫩,不用削皮.

sentences.en: They only just managed to scrape the money together.
sentences.cn: 他们只是勉强凑够了钱。

sentences.en: We can scrape along without asking for subsidies.
sentences.cn: 我们不要求补助也能过下去.

sentences.en: We don't have much money but we scrape along somehow.
sentences.cn: 虽然我们没多少钱,但是还可以过得下去.

sentences.en: We managed to scrape an audience of fifty people.
sentences.cn: 我们设法争取到了五十名观众.

words.tran_cn: 刮削下的碎屑；刮擦声；抹去

phrases.phrase: scrape the barrel (或 the bottom of the barrel)
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)退而求其次；起用剩下的次等人才（或物资）

trans.tran_cn: 擦，刮，刮痕，刮擦声，刮胡子，修面
trans.tran_en: a mark or slight injury caused by rubbing against a rough surface
to remove something from a surface using the edge of a knife, a stick etc
to remove something from a surface using the edge of a knife, a stick etc

trans.tran_cn: 刮，擦，搔，抓，掏，发出刺耳的声音
擦，刮，擦去，擦伤，刮破，挖空

trans.tran_en: to remove something from a surface using the edge of a knife, a stick etc
